name: Marbles of Darkness
description:
A dark cloud is about to cover the island. Collect bits of light to  get rid of it and return the daylight!

Marbles of Darkness is a marble shooter puzzle game with 3 game modes. 25 maps, plenty of power ups and more!

· Play through almost 90 levels divided into 13 stages in Adventure mode.

· Practice maps in 5 difficulties in Practice mode.

· Survive as long as you can against an endless stream of orbs in Endless mode.

· Create combos and chains for power ups that will help you clear the orbs.
